text: Fernando Sebastián Aguilar CMF (14 December 1929 – 24 January 2019) was a Spanish cardinal. He was born in Calatayud, Spain. He was Bishop of León from 1979 to 1983 and Archbishop of Pamplona and Tudela from 1983 to 2007. Sebastián Aguilar died from complications of a stroke on 24 January 2019 in Málaga, Spain, aged 89.Fallece el Cardenal Fernando Sebastián Aguilar ==References== ==Other websites== *Fernando Sebastián Aguilar Category:1929 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Spanish cardinals Category:Spanish Roman Catholic archbishops
title: Fernando Sebastián Aguilar
